item.title: Chime, last valued at $25B, aims for $11B in upcoming IPO
item.description: Chime, whose pending IPO is expected to be one of 2025’s blockbuster hits, issued a share price range on Monday of $24 to $26. That’s an up-to-$11.2-b...

item.title: Breakneck data center growth challenges Microsoft’s sustainability goals
item.description: Microsoft's sustainability goals are imperiled by its push into AI and cloud services.
